dict.acceptation: 为…供给资金， 从事金融活动；赊货给…；掌握财政；

sent.orig: In charge of finance, insurance, IPO management, assist of investment and finance management centre, finance office.
sent.trans: 分管金融、保险、企业上市工作，协管投融资管理中心、金融办。

sent.orig: The Tendency of Modern Finance Development and the Reform of Finance Teaching CrossEducation of Finance ""
sent.trans: 现代金融的发展趋势与金融学教育教学改革——“2006年海峡两岸金融教育论坛”综述。

sent.orig: Third, the level of finance development, specially the rural finance flaw created the distribution margin.
sent.trans: 第三，金融发展水平，特别是农村金融的缺失是造成城乡差距的重要原因。

sent.orig: Accompanied with the prevail of finance lease, the problem existed in finance lease also arises.
sent.trans: 伴随着融资租赁业的盛行，融资租赁业务中所存在的问题也日益凸现。

sent.orig: The Masters in Finance (MiF) is widely regarded as pre-eminent postgraduate qualification for finance professionals.
sent.trans: 美国名人赛在财金（多国临时部队）被广泛认为是卓越的研究生资格的金融专业人员。
